properties.areaDesc: East Entrance U.S. Waters Strait Of Juan De Fuca
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 1 at 2:39PM PST until March 2 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Seattle WA
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 kt becoming south.

* WHERE...East Entrance U. S. Waters Strait Of Juan De Fuca.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 7 AM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that wind speeds of 21 to 33 knots
and/or seas 10 feet or higher are expected to produce hazardous
wave conditions to small craft. Inexperienced mariners,
especially those operating smaller vessels should avoid
navigating in these conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM PST MONDAY
